script_texts.content:
Hi is _____ there?  This is _______ with Freedom Indiana.  I’m calling to invite you to one last event, a celebration of our work this year!  Did you hear what happened with HJR-3 in the Senate last week?

[If yes]  So you know we not only kept HJR-3 off the ballot this year but we convinced the legislature to remove the part of HJR-3 that banned civil unions.

[If no] On Thursday last week, the Senate declined to amend HJR-3 and put the second sentence back in, the part that would have banned civil unions for gay and lesbian couples.  That means that HJR-3 won’t be on the ballot this year and we have two more years to stop this amendment once and for all.  Isn’t that great?

Community Celebration Ask
We’ve all done such amazing work to make this happen.  We’re hosting a community celebration on Thursday to celebrate our amazing success and thank the volunteers like you who made it all possible.  We’ll also be talking about how to continue the momentum we’ve created here in ______[city].

We’ll be celebrating at the ____________________________[location] at ___pm.  Can you join us on Thursday?

[If no] I understand.  Well, thank you so much for what you’ve contributed to this campaign.  If you would like to get in touch with me with any questions or comments about what comes next, you can reach me at __________________________.  Thank you for your work!

[If yes] Great!  This is going to be a potluck-style celebration.  Can you bring a dish to share with the group?  Thank you so much for everything you’ve contributed so far and we’ll see you on Thursday!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Message Script

Hi, this is _______________ with Freedom Indiana.  I’m calling to thank you for everything you’ve contributed to defeating HJR-3 and to invite you to our Community Celebration on Thursday at 7:00 pm at the Unitarian Universalist church located at 5310 Old Mill Road.

At this celebration we’ll be celebrating our amazing success and thanking everyone who made it possible.  We’ll also be discussing the next steps for Fort Wayne to keep our momentum going.  This will be a potluck event so please bring a dish to share if you can.   If you have any questions, feel free to call me at 260-251-9283.  We hope to see you there!
